ygData.subject: RE: Cleric Behavior
ygData.msgSnippet: For player made jewelry there is a great table at this site. http://eq.castersrealm.com/misc/jewellery/jewel_table.asp ... From: Mr. J Daniels
ygData.messageBody:
For player made jewelry there is a great table at this site.

http://eq.castersrealm.com/misc/jewellery/jewel_table.asp



-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. J Daniels [mailto:warpig@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 24, 1999 10:28 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour


From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>

Yes there are plenty of wisdom enhancing items, I'll rattle off a few.

Gatorscale leggings - Found off Ancient Croc in lower guk
Blood Stained Tunic - Found in Unrest
Plat Armband - Found in Sol A.
Mammoth Cloak - Found in Everfrost (I believe,I traded for mine.)
Molten Cloak - Found in Sol A. (I believe.)
Plat Ruby Vail - (Jeweler made)
Silver Ruby Vail - (Jeweler made)
Eyepatch - Found in Mistmoore off of Imp in Grave Yard
Blackened Iron Med - Found in Runneye
Runed circlet - Found in Everfrost
Observer Staff - Gnome Quest, peice for staff is in Runneye off
Broxx
Gem Sceptre - (I aint tellin till I get one. :) ).
Paw of Opallo - (See above. :) )
Gldn Blck Pearl Chkr - (jeweler made)
Polished Bone Brclts - Evil eye in the zone off of Runneye


Thats some of them, there are other jeweler made items you can get,
(earrings rings etc).

Mr. J Daniels


On Tue, 24 Aug 1999, Rose wrote:

> From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
>
> Thank you Mr. J Daniels, =)
>
> So I guess WIS items are worth more then, let say, manna enhancing items
> (EX: + 20 manna vs + 5 WIS item). I know of few WIS items. They are:
>
> That thingy u get from Runneye + 3 WIS
> Charred shield
> jewelled encrusted scepter
> Savant cap (?)
>
> Anything else that enhances WIS?
>
> -Imogen
>
